creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: Octagonally lobed faience plate; rim edge in rose, containing painted insects in same color; center holds landscape with buildings and a large tree, all in rose camieu; mark painted in style of J. Deutsch and used in the 18th c. or possibly earlier
markings: \'N\', in script, in blue, on base
title: Plate
